wired.title: The Joseph Grado Inventions That Shaped the Way We Hear Music
wired.topComment: If you listen to music through any device, hats off to Joesph Grado. From Brooklyn to the world we all lose a little with his passing. Bye Joe, listen to the angels now.

wired.title: Japanese Sex Hotels Cater to All Kinds of Fetishes, Even Hello Kitty S&M
wired.topComment: Now this is real tech news.

wired.title: This Incredible Hospital Robot Is Saving Lives. Also, I Hate It
wired.topComment: This is really cool. I bet the nursing staff love not having to do all that fetching and carrying, letting them focus on patient care instead.

wired.title: You May Never Use Xiaomi's Phones, But They'll Change Your Life Anyway
wired.topComment: The author assumes that Google sold Motorola because it was unsuccessful in hardware (Motorola phones and new models such as the X and G). However, there have been many articles that quote Google as saying that they knew that it would take many years...
